Vinnie's Resume / CV

Tattoo Artist

Current Spot

BodyCanvas. Amsterdam, Netherlands. Since May 2019.

Previous Collaborations

BodyCult. Amsterdam and Utrecht, Netherlands. Since November 2018.

The Wicked Crow. The Hague, Netherlands. August - October 2018.

Seminars

Global Tattoo Mag. Lörrach, Germany. September, 2018. International Collective: 16 hours of techniques, live and direct tattooing with Jay Freestyle, Maksims Zotovs aka Laky, Damian Gorski, Cristian Casas, Robert Tufeanu, and Tom Farrow.

Tattoo Convention Artist ​

Tattoo Week. Natal, Brazil. March, 2017 ​​

Owner - Body Canvas Tattoo

Hamilton, Bermuda. 2011 - 2016

Resident Artist Spots

​Paint Studios, Cologne, Germany. March 2017 - June 2018. Chrome Tattoo. London, UK. April 2010 - June 2011 New Derm Tattoo. Fortaleza, Brazil. 2004 - 2010

Guest Artist Spots

Chaman Ink. Cologne, Germany. December 2016 - January 2017 BrazInk Tattoo. Belfast, N. Ireland. Sept. - Oct. 2016; Feb. 2017 Tuba Tattoo. Lisbon, Portugal. July - August 2016 Bee Primitive Tattoo. Fortaleza, Brazil. April - June 2016 Dark Angel. London, UK. February - March 2010

Conference

​World Tattoo Event, Boston, USA.
​June 2013 3 day intensive workshop with artists Guy Aitchison, Nick Baxter, Joe Capobianco, Jeff Gogue, Nikko Hurtado, and Bob Tyrell.

Workshops (Fortaleza, Brazil)

Realistic portraits, black & white, and colour with Vandim Tattoo. Portraits with Renato Cardoso.

Apprenticeship

Freedom of Tattoo. Fortaleza, Brazil. 1997 - 2002 (Part time)
